sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-BUSINESS-BILL-INSERT*/ INTO business_bill(business_bill_id,letter_id,form_id,insurance_of_type,bill_no,price_no,renewal_no,batch_no,plate_number,periods,insurance_depart,insurance_team,insurance_broker_no,insurance_broker_name,insurance_no,invoice_no,bill_customer_id,bill_customer_name,bill_insured_id,bill_insured_name,insurance_type_id,insurance_type_name,insurance_catalog_id,insurance_catalog_name,insurance_amount,premium_amount,insuranceDate,beginDate,endDate,business_user_id,business_user_name,insurance_company_id,insurance_company_name,agency_company_id,agency_company_name,remark,sorce_business_bill_id,bill_status,status,version,creator_id,creator_name,raw_add_time) VALUES (#businessBillId#,#letterId#,#formId#,#insuranceOfType#,#billNo#,#priceNo#,#renewalNo#,#batchNo#,#plateNumber#,#periods#,#insuranceDepart#,#insuranceTeam#,#insuranceBrokerNo#,#insuranceBrokerName#,#insuranceNo#,#invoiceNo#,#billCustomerId#,#billCustomerName#,#billInsuredId#,#billInsuredName#,#insuranceTypeId#,#insuranceTypeName#,#insuranceCatalogId#,#insuranceCatalogName#,#insuranceAmount#,#premiumAmount#,#insuranceDate#,#beginDate#,#endDate#,#businessUserId#,#businessUserName#,#insuranceCompanyId#,#insuranceCompanyName#,#agencyCompanyId#,#agencyCompanyName#,#remark#,#sorceBusinessBillId#,#billStatus#,#status#,#version#,#creatorId#,#creatorName#,#rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-BUSINESS-BILL-UPDATE*/ business_bill set letter_id=#letterId#, form_id=#formId#, insurance_of_type=#insuranceOfType#, bill_no=#billNo#, price_no=#priceNo#, renewal_no=#renewalNo#, batch_no=#batchNo#, plate_number=#plateNumber#, periods=#periods#, insurance_depart=#insuranceDepart#, insurance_team=#insuranceTeam#, insurance_broker_no=#insuranceBrokerNo#, insurance_broker_name=#insuranceBrokerName#, insurance_no=#insuranceNo#, invoice_no=#invoiceNo#, bill_customer_id=#billCustomerId#, bill_customer_name=#billCustomerName#, bill_insured_id=#billInsuredId#, bill_insured_name=#billInsuredName#, insurance_type_id=#insuranceTypeId#, insurance_type_name=#insuranceTypeName#, insurance_catalog_id=#insuranceCatalogId#, insurance_catalog_name=#insuranceCatalogName#, insurance_amount=#insuranceAmount.cent#, premium_amount=#premiumAmount.cent#, insuranceDate=#insuranceDate#, beginDate=#beginDate#, endDate=#endDate#, business_user_id=#businessUserId#, business_user_name=#businessUserName#, insurance_company_id=#insuranceCompanyId#, insurance_company_name=#insuranceCompanyName#, agency_company_id=#agencyCompanyId#, agency_company_name=#agencyCompanyName#, broker_scale=#brokerScale#, common_scale=#commonScale#, gross_rate=#grossRate#, gross_profit=#grossProfit.cent#, broker_val=#brokerVal.cent#, common_val=#commonVal.cent#, remark=#remark#, sorce_business_bill_id=#sorceBusinessBillId#, bill_status=#billStatus#, status=#status#, version=#version#, creator_id=#creatorId#, creator_name=#creatorName# where (business_bill_id = #businessBillId#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-BUSINESS-BILL-FIND-BY-ID*/ business_bill_id, letter_id, form_id, insurance_of_type, bill_no, price_no, renewal_no, batch_no, plate_number, periods, insurance_depart, insurance_team, insurance_broker_no, insurance_broker_name, insurance_no, invoice_no, bill_customer_id, bill_customer_name, bill_insured_id, bill_insured_name, insurance_type_id, insurance_type_name, insurance_catalog_id, insurance_catalog_name, insurance_amount, premium_amount, insuranceDate, beginDate, endDate, business_user_id, business_user_name, insurance_company_id, insurance_company_name, agency_company_id, agency_company_name, broker_scale, common_scale, gross_rate, gross_profit, broker_val, common_val, remark, sorce_business_bill_id, bill_status, status, version, creator_id, creator_name, raw_add_time, raw_update_time from business_bill where (business_bill_id = #value#)

select /*MS-YRD-BUSINESS-BILL-FIND-BY-FORM-ID*/ business_bill_id, letter_id, form_id, insurance_of_type, bill_no, price_no, renewal_no, batch_no, plate_number, periods, insurance_depart, insurance_team, insurance_broker_no, insurance_broker_name, insurance_no, invoice_no, bill_customer_id, bill_customer_name, bill_insured_id, bill_insured_name, insurance_type_id, insurance_type_name, insurance_catalog_id, insurance_catalog_name, insurance_amount, premium_amount, insuranceDate, beginDate, endDate, business_user_id, business_user_name, insurance_company_id, insurance_company_name, agency_company_id, agency_company_name, broker_scale, common_scale, gross_rate, gross_profit, broker_val, common_val, remark, sorce_business_bill_id, bill_status, status, version, creator_id, creator_name, raw_add_time, raw_update_time from business_bill where (form_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-BUSINESS-BILL-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ business_bill_id ,letter_id ,form_id ,insurance_of_type ,bill_no ,price_no ,renewal_no ,batch_no ,plate_number,periods,insurance_depart ,insurance_team ,insurance_broker_no ,insurance_broker_name ,insurance_no ,invoice_no ,bill_customer_id ,bill_customer_name ,bill_insured_id ,bill_insured_name ,insurance_type_id ,insurance_type_name ,insurance_catalog_id ,insurance_catalog_name ,insurance_amount ,premium_amount ,insuranceDate ,beginDate ,endDate ,business_user_id ,business_user_name ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,agency_company_id ,agency_company_name ,broker_scale,common_scale,gross_rate,gross_profit,broker_val,common_val,remark ,sorce_business_bill_id ,bill_status,status ,version ,creator_id ,creator_name ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM business_bill where 1=1
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#
